bibl.title: The Fossils of Qau el Kebir and Their Role in the Mythology of the 10th Nome of Upper-Egypt. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: See pp. 172-173: Antaios and Antaiopolis. The main god of the city was Nemty(wey), a god combining Horus and Seth, identified with the Libyan giant Antaios by the Greeks and Romans.
bibl.seg: WELVAERT Eric, The Fossils of Qau el Kebir and Their Role in the Mythology of the 10th Nome of Upper-Egypt. Avec résumé en anglais.
See pp. 172-173: Antaios and Antaiopolis. The main god of the city was Nemty(wey), a god combining Horus and Seth, identified with the Libyan giant Antaios by the Greeks and Romans.
